mapper.insert: insert into t_user (idx, id, pwd, name, nickname, phone, email, age, gender, addr1, addr2, blood, file_id, intro_content, ip, status, reg_date, us_viewyn, addr3) values(#{idx}, #{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{phone} , #{email}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{blood}, #{file_id} , #{intro_content}, #{ip}, #{status}, #{reg_date}, #{us_viewyn}, #{addr3})
mapper.update: update t_user set loginyn=#{loginyn} , login_date = #{login_date}, ip = #{ip} where id = #{id}
